@title FundingRateApplier contract.
 @notice Provides funding rate payment functionality for the Perpetual contract.

params._finderAddress: Finder used to discover financial-product-related contracts.
params._fundingRateIdentifier: Unique identifier for DVM price feed ticker for child financial contract.
params._timerAddress: Contract that stores the current time in a testing environment. Must be set to 0x0 for production environments that use live time.

methods.constructor: Constructs the FundingRateApplier contract. Called by child contracts.

userdoc.notice: Provides funding rate payment functionality for the Perpetual contract.
